#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int r_i()
{
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    int k=0,fl=0;
    for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
    {
        if(s[i]!='.')
        k=10*k+(s[i]-'0');
        else fl=1;
    }
    if(fl)
    return k;
    else return 100*k;
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,n,m,u=1,v;
    t=r_i()/100;
    while(t--)
    {
        n=r_i()/100;
        m=r_i()/100;
        int x,k;
        int a[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            a[i]=r_i();//cout<<a[i]<<" ";
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        //for(i=0;i<n;i++)cout<<a[i]<<" ";cout<<"\n";
        v=1;
        printf("Case %d:\n",u++);
        while(m--)
        {
            k=r_i();
            printf("Scenario %d:\n",v++);
            j=n-1;
            while(k>0)
            {
                //cout<<a[j]<<" ";
                if(k>=a[j])
                {
                    //cout<<a[j]<<"pp";
                    if(a[j]>=100)
                    printf("%d %d\n",a[j]/100,k/a[j]);
                    else
                    printf("%0.2lf %d\n",a[j]/100.0,k/a[j]);
                    k=k-int(k/a[j])*a[j];
                }
                j--;
                //cout<<"k="<<k<<"\n";
            }
        }
    }
}
